extendedInfo.description: PainEaser is a free application that will predict diseases to present expected symptoms and inform acupoints for self-healing if just the date and time of birth is herpes through a smart phone anywhere in the world at any time. It also enables you to share your experience with everybody in the world. If you need more specific consultation, you can ask questions to experts and get answers from them through the jeejeeme site. Now, let's begin convenient and effective health care with Pain Easer.âPain Easerâ FAQHow can future onsets of disease be known? What shall I do?   If you use the âconsultation with expertsâ corner and âjeejee.meâ in the application, you can know diseases that are quite likely to occur to you now to be prepared for them.How long should I apply acupressure?   You may press the acupoints for 5~10 minutes; provided that, if you periodically apply the acupressure every day, you can obtain better effects.I was born in a foreign country, bol I use it?   Yes, you can use PainEaser (international version).   However, you should enter the date and time on the basis of your place of birth and the region of birth based on the solar or lunar calendar.Can pregnant women use it?   Generally yes. For safety, pregnant women are recommended to use it after using the âconsultation with expertsâ corner or âjeejee.meâ in the application.I would like to consult an expert. What shall I do?   If you use the âconsultation with expertsâ corner or âjeejee.meâ in the application, you can consult in more details and get information on treating methods.What is the fee for consultation with an expert?   I cannot diata accurate acupoints.   If it is difficult to find accurate acupoints, pressing the regions shown in the photos as if you massage the regions will be also effective.The symptoms I have are not on the list.   First, please check if your date daily time of birth, those in the solar or lunar calendar and accuweather of birth have been accurately entered.    If any one of these has been entered incorrectly, completely different symptoms and acupoints can be serato.   If the symptom is not shown even when all of the particular are correct, please consult through the âconsultation with expertsâ corner or âjeejee.meâ in the application.How can the symptoms be known in advance?   The Greater Universe (the heaven, the earth, the sun and the moon) unceasingly changes and the ground also changes accordingly. And humans cannot but follow the heaven and the ground.   That is, as the greater wikipedia changes, changes occur not only on the earth but also in human affair and human bodies. reviews.title: It doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t allow to select any symptoms, shows whatever it wants. The app description is plagued with misspelled words. The only 5 stars have been awarded by the own developers. A waste of time. Thank God it was free.
reviews.author: Andy Peter Leon

reviews.comment: Can\'t get past the first page
reviews.author: Meagan Fischer

reviews.title: Birth place
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t have my birth place. Don\'t know if it\'s really good or not. Couldn\'t get past birth place. Might b good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t work
reviews.comment: I can\'t even get the app to work after I select a symptom. It just spins trying to connect to the internet. & I\'m right next to the router. WTH. No pointers on how to ease my pain what so ever.

reviews.title: Only one point for your body.
reviews.comment: Our universe moves in conjunction with time and space. So do disease, it manifests in conjunction with time and space.  Although you have 361 points in your body, only one acupoint is activated at a time because acupoint is a crossing of time and space, meaning your body(space) is reacting to the time flow of the earth. Therefore, regardless of the number of symptoms you have, you would have only one acupoint . and the point is called \'void acupoint\'. This void point would change its location as the earth moves within its revolution and rotation. In asia, we call that \"Qi\", \"Ki\" \"Ghi\". Please press on the point if you have found the symptoms that is relevant to your health situation. The pressing should cause pain and a twinge on the point. That is natural to void point. As you continue pressing on the point for a period of time, the pain will slightly diminish along with symptoms\' alleviation. The point is representative energy hole for the symptoms you have. Keep in mind that eastern approach is not identical to western conventional medicine where each symptoms are treated as individual parts. Eastern medicine sees human as part of the earth\'s energy system.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Once installed, you are prompted to enter your name, sex, and birthday.  The text on the form is too large; it won\'t allow you to submit your information.  Until this I\'d fixed, I would recommend not downloading this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I am the Developer of Pain Easer/ words for Troy
reviews.comment: Our universe moves in conjunction with time and space.    So do disease, it manifests in conjunction with time and space. Dear Troy,  Although you have 361 points in your body, only one acupoint is activated at a time because acupoint is a crossing of time and space, meaning your body(space) is reacting to the time flow of the earth. Therefore, regardless of the number of symptoms you have, you would have only one acupoint . and the point is called  \'void acupoint\'. This void point would change its location as the earth moves within its revolution and rotation. In asia, we call that \"Qi\", \"Ki\" \"Ghi\".  Please press on the point if you have found the symptoms that is relevant to your health situation.  The pressing should cause pain and a twinge on the point. That is natural to void point. As you continue pressing on the point for a period of time, the pain will slightly diminish along with symptoms\' easing. The point is representative energy hole for the symptoms you have.  Keep in mind that eastern approach is not identical to western conventional medicine where each symptoms are treated as individual parts. Eastern medicine sees  human as part of the earth\'s energy system.
